DOC.brief_title: Corticospinal Excitability After rTMS Spinal Cord Injury Patients
DOC.detailed_description: After give prior informed consent , volunteer submit three randomize counterbalance session use website ( randomization.com ) non-involved researcher . At study beginning , volunteer evaluate structured questionnaire session , comprise follow experimental sequence : 1 . Quantity quality sleep : It enquire many hour volunteer slept last night . The quality sleep measure analogue scale grade 0 ( bad quality sleep ) 10 point ( best quality sleep ) . 2 . Type eating : All individual ask ingestion food drink could change cortical excitability ( e. g. ; coffee , chocolate , energetic , soda e etcc ) . If positive , researcher record time since ingestion quantify amount food . 3 . Fatigue motivation level : It measure analogue scale grade 0 ( low fatigue motivation level ) 10 point ( great fatigue motivation level ) . 4 . Spasticity : It assess modified Ashworth scale range 0 4 . Performs passive drive member measure observing time arise resistance difficult passive movement . This scale test bilaterally muscle low limb , test muscle quadriceps , adductor , hamstring , dorsiflexors , hip flexor flexor plant . The scale always apply evaluator . 5 . Spinal cord activity : level excitability spinal cord measure follow outcome : • Hoffman reflex ( H reflex ) : H reflex elicit percutaneous electrical stimulation tibial nerve deliver popliteal fossa record electromyographic response soleus muscle . The value maximal H reflex , M wave maximal H reflex maximal M wave ratio ( H/M ratio ) obtain recruitment curve . The recruitment curve start stimulus intensity deliver 2 milliampere ( mA ) increase step 1 mA M wave curve stabilization ( increase M wave amplitude ) . • Homosynaptic depression ( HD ) : HD obtain serie two consecutive stimulus separate interstimulus interval ( 30 ms 10.000 m ) . The stimulus deliver popliteal fossa electromyographic response soleus muscle record . The stimulus deliver intensity necessary produce maximal H reflex ( information available recruitment curve state ) . The difference first second stimulus interstimulus interval give rise recovery curve . 6 . Cortical excitability : cortical excitability measure motor evoke potential ( MEP ) simple pulse transcranial magnetic stimulation ( BiStim2 , Magstim , UK ) Initially , high cortical representation area ( hotspot ) first right dorsal interosseous ( FDI ) muscle determine figure-eight coil connect magnetic stimulator hold manually 45 degree midline , place right primary motor cortex ( C3 - 10/20 System ) . Then , determine rest motor threshold ( RMT ) find low stimulator output elicit motor evoke potential ( MEP ) least 50 microvolt ( μV ) . After determined RMT , MEP value obtain twenty suprathreshold ( 130 % RMT ) stimulus deliver primary motor cortex ( C3 ) . 7. rTMS : Initially , high cortical representation area ( hotspot ) first right dorsal interosseous ( FDI ) muscle determine figure-eight coil connect magnetic stimulator ( Rapid2 , Magstim , UK ) hold manually 45 degree midline , place right primary motor cortex ( C3 - 10/20 System ) . Then , determine rest motor threshold ( RMT ) find low stimulator output elicit motor evoke potential ( MEP ) least 50 microvolt ( μV ) . After determined RMT , coil position scalp ( Cz - 10/20 System ) base previous study perform rTMS protocol . Low frequency protocol : 1 hertz ( Hz ) , 90 % RMT , 1500 stimulus ( 1 train ) . High frequency protocol : 20 Hz , 90 % RMT , 45 train , 40 stimulus per train , inter interval 28 second , 1800 stimulus . Sham rTMS perform low frequency protocol use two coil . The first one - connect stimulator - position coil support close volunteer visible . Therefore , characteristic stimulation noise audible . The second - disconnect stimulator - place left primary motor area . After rTMS session , presence adverse effect compute . 8 . Spasticity : evaluation perform immediately ( T0 ) , thirty minute ( T1 ) 1 hour ( T2 ) rTMS . The procedure conduct follow protocol . 9 . Spinal cord activity : evaluation perform immediately ( T0 ) , thirty minute ( T1 ) 1 hour ( T2 ) rTMS . The procedure conduct follow protocol . 10 . Cortical brain activity : evaluation perform revaluation spinal cord activity ( T0 , T1 T2 ) . The procedure conduct follow protocol .
